alert.note: Alert for La Porte (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Lakeshore Flood Advisory issued February 18 at 3:13AM EST until February 18 at 7:00AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...LAKESHORE FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Waves of 6 to 10 feet this morning will likely cause minor beach erosion and lakeshore flooding. * WHERE...La Porte county. * WHEN...Until 6 AM CST early this morning. * IMPACTS...Parking lots and roads along the immediate lakeshore will experience minor flooding. Minor erosion of beaches and sand dunes is expected.
info.instruction: A Lakeshore Flood Advisory indicates that onshore winds will generate flooding of low areas along the lakeshore. Some minor beach and dune erosion is also likely.
